publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3667 Mr Mark Ruskell: International Day of Climate Protest - Edinburgh, 3 December 2005—That the Parliament welcomes the International Day of Climate Protest on Saturday 3 December 2005 and the demonstrations being held in Edinburgh and London; notes that 32 countries are taking part so far, including all G8 nations; notes that the Edinburgh demonstration will gather at 11 am in East Market Street, near Waverley station, set off at 11.30 am and rally outside the Parliament at 12.15 pm; notes that speakers include Duncan McLaren from Friends of the Earth Scotland, Mark Lazarowicz MP, Mike Pringle MSP and Mark Ballard MSP; notes that organisers are planning to include a choir, drumming and the Canapés and Cocktails Collective providing mince pies and warm drinks; notes that further information is available at http://www.globalclimatecampaign.org/index-en.shtml, and encourages everyone in Scotland concerned about climate change to take part in the Edinburgh demonstration this Saturday.
S2M-3667 International Day of Climate Protest - Edinburgh, 3 December 2005 (lodged on 1 December 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
